components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to du in United Arab Emirates

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery failures to du in United Arab Emirates. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures to du in United Arab Emirates. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Twilio Phone Numbers in US via Subset of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Twilio Phone Numbers in US via Subset of Shortcodes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Call Failures From A Subset of Twilio's Phone Numbers to Slovakia

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for call failures from a subset of Twilio's phone numbers to Slovakia. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience call failures from a subset of Twilio's phone numbers to Slovakia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing call failures from a subset of Twilio's phone numbers to Slovakia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Malaysia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 02 October 2025 at 01:00 PDT until 02 October 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Malaysia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body:
The MTS network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2025 at 12:00 PDT until 02 October 2025 at 15:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTS Russia handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 October 2025 at 22:00 PDT until 02 October 2025 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match

CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

The Verizon network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 30 September 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 03 October 2025 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from Verizon United States handsets.

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
